trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> that is a composite of the Materials in its collection.

Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DiffuseMaterial>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpecularMaterial>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.EmissiveMaterial> provide distinctly different effects, it's useful to combine them.
For example, you might choose to apply a complex texture to a mesh using DiffuseMaterial, while adding a highlighting effect with a SpecularMaterial on the same mesh.
MaterialGroup allows you to treat these Materials as a single texture for convenience.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialGroup"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a collection of child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> objects.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialCollection"></xref> that contains the child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material"></xref> objects.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialGroup.Children"></xref> dependency property.
Returns a modifiable copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialGroup"></xref>.
A modifiable copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialGroup"></xref>.
The returned copy is effectively a deep clone of the current object, although some copying might be deferred until necessary for improved performance.
The copy's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property is `false`.
Returns a non-animated version of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialGroup"></xref>.
The returned <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialGroup"></xref> represents the current object's state at the time this method was called.
Returns the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialGroup"></xref>.
The returned <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MaterialGroup"></xref> has the same value as the instantaneous value of the current object, but is not animated.
